about_the_game:
Wojak Rush: Simple Rules, Complex Challenges!

Rule #1: Be a Wojak. Rule #2: Avoid the traps. Sounds easy, right? Think again.

Prepare to face a relentless gauntlet of irksome challenges and treacherous terrains designed to test your reflexes and patience.

Can You Handle the Pressure?

  • Stay Cool… or Don’t, and Die!
    Your nerves will be pushed to the limit. Lose focus for a moment, and it’s game over.

  • Reflexes Put to the Test!
    Every trap is designed to catch you off guard. Can you stay one step ahead?

  • Troll Background Music:
    The soundtrack will mock your failures, adding an extra layer of frustration and hilarity.

A Journey of Pain and Progress

  • Expect to Fail—A Lot:
    Death is inevitable, and with every failure, you lose all your progress. But each attempt makes you better, sharper, and more determined.

  • A Symphony of Ragdoll Deaths:
    Experience a variety of hilarious and sometimes infuriating death animations, thanks to the game’s ragdoll physics.

The Ultimate Reward

  • Hidden Treasure Awaits:
    Endure the torment, outwit the traps, and claim the ultimate prize. Nothing beats the satisfaction of overcoming every obstacle in your path.

Can you be the Wojak who masters every level, conquers frustration, and finishes with the least deaths in the shortest time? Prove it!

name: Wojak This Game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2100 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-2550K, 3.4 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or Radeon R9 290X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 350 MB available space

short_description: Be the Wojak who can complete this platformer-adventure game in the shortest amount of time with the fewest deaths! Featuring parkour mechanics, ragdoll physics, and troll-inspired challenges, every run will push your skills to the limit.
